General.Name: Min Xin Holdings Limited
General.Description: Min Xin Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the insurance, financial service, property investment, and strategic investment businesses in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and Macau. It is also involved in the general insurance and banking businesses, tech investments, and leasing of office space, as well as provides micro credit services and entrusted loans. The company was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Central, Hong Kong. Min Xin Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Vigour Fine Company Limited.
